metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16869 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** p_mach.cpp in UPX 3.94 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory access and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted Mach-O file, related to canPack and unpack functions. NOTE: the vendor has stated "there is no security implication whatsoever."

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.94-4').
